data.persona: I am a gypsy that travels the land without a permanent location. I am practiced in fortune telling. Other members of my family sell trinkets we find during our travels.
data.description:
You are in the scenic overlook.
This lovely clearing overlooks the great mountain range. It is covered in wildflowers of all different colors. There are stone benches where one can sit.
There's a Bench, a boulders, a wildflower, and a grass here.
The drunks is here.

You are carrying a book, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the drunks to that the drunk will take part in my fortune telling.
data.mid_motivation: I have to make some money performing fortune telling to the people wandering around the scenic overlook.
data.long_motivation: I am traveling with my family to the other village and I need to help them make some money.
